about_the_game:
Hack & Slash your way through a world full of punks, metal heads, droogs, skinheads and other interesting types in this hand-drawn 2D adventure.

Game Features

  • Explore a Gritty, Non-linear, Hand-Drawn World in a classic 2D style.

  • Navigate the tattered streets of Orangeside, a city full of subcultures, hidden secrets, and unexpected challenges at every turn.

  • Explore seven illustrative levels with grandiose parallax for an impression of depth, from the humble suburbs, to the boundaries beyond Orangeside.

  • Tight controls so you can bash your way through even the most formidable foe.

  • Wield your Les Paul guitar in straightforward, skill-based bloody combat.

  • Battle through bosses and various subcultures. You'll engage with droogs, punks, metal heads, and more as you journey through Orangeside.

  • Gain new tools such as the semi-lethal firearm.

  • Customize your character from body type, voice, to hair, and clothing styles.

  • Accompany your journey with a rock-centric soundtrack featuring punk, metal, and darkwave, heightening the intensity of every encounter composed by the developer.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood & violence, alcohol and drug use.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: As a mischievous punk rocker, you'll hack your way through a new city filled with droogs, punks, metal heads, other subcultures, and ultimately learn to navigate one of the most perilous cities around, Orangeside, packaged in a gitty, hand-drawn 2D world.
